name: Cyber Hooker
description:
Swing your way past enemies and over buildings in this procedurally generated action game.  Your grappling hook and your reflexes are the only tools you have as you try to make it the farthest, upload your score, and be the best hooker in town!

Left click to shoot grappling hook in cursor direction and detach hook

Space bar to jump release from rope or small air jump after release

http://gamejolt.com/profile/darkuser/129325/
